title: Lighthouse transition journey : from warp to axum
description:
This talk will explore how to approach a significant refactor of the HTTP framework for lighthouse. 

It will cover:
- Measuring the performance of endpoints between Warp and Axum
- A concrete plan for implementing the necessary changes
